question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn back and move forward towards the buildings till the brown building which have a glass on its top. now turn back and get closer to the blue building and get high and move forward till the pond arrives. now fly over the pond and move forward towards the road is visible. now turn left and move forward towards the buildings till the building have a banner named bolt cola. now move forward towards the buildings and get closer to the brown building and turn right and move forward till the road splits. now turn left and move forward towards the buildings till the blue building arrives and get closer to its bottom and stay there.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach your current location, what is your Landmark Position to the brown glass-roofed building?  
choose:  
A. I am located to the left of the brown glass-roofed building.  
B. I am far away from the brown building with a glass roof.  
C. I am above a brown building with a glass roof.  
D. I am located to the right of the brown glass-roofed building.  
E. I am located underneath a brown building with a glass top.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location, as depicted in the images, shows a view of the cityscape with multiple buildings but does not indicate proximity to a specific "brown glass-roofed building." The agent appears to be at a distance from any particular building with such a description, suggesting that it is far away from the brown building with a glass roof.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 45)]
Option: B
Reason: The video shows the agent moving through the environment. Based on the navigation instructions, the agent was asked to move towards the brown building with a glass top, then turn back and get closer to the blue building, and then get high. The video shows the agent is currently near the blue building and is at a high altitude. Therefore, the agent is far away from the brown building with a glass roof.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location, as depicted in the images, shows a view of the cityscape with multiple buildings but does not indicate proximity to a specific "brown glass-roofed building." The agent appears to be at a distance from any particular building with such a description, suggesting that it is far away from the brown building with a glass roof.
